commits.message: Abandoned rabbit hole no longer permanent (turns back into a growing rabbit hole after one hour).
Labeled graves can now be dug up.  No more blocking doors forever with an Uncle grave.
Unlocked storage boxes can be chopped with an ax (so they can't permanently block a door).

Penguins and seals now move 2 units south when leaving ice hole, so the move extension code can kick in if they are blocked to the south (making ice hole disappearance less likely.... the same fix that helped with bear caves a few weeks ago).
Wayward transition was allowing needle and thread to fix bite wound without cleaning it first.  Fixes #17.
Can no longer use rope to make tied skewer (was a wasteful, redundant method, when thread suffices).  Fixes #19.
Can now take water from goose pond with egg, and last bit of water from pond with dead goose.  Fixes #18.
